text: [Music]
hi my name is Matt Sibley and I'm a
senior product manager with Amazon s3
I'm here today to provide an overview of
the s3 storage classes at AWS we
understand that customers have to manage
large data sets a single data set may
have objects with different storage
requirements and storing in the wrong
storage class can be costly to help
Amazon s3 offers a wide range of storage
classes that support varying levels of
data access at corresponding costs this
means that you can store less frequently
access data at cheaper rates and even
archive objects at the lowest cost for
maximum savings all of the s3 storage
classes are designed for high
performance for scalability availability
and industry-leading durability let's
review all of the s3 storage classes as
three standard is for frequently
accessed data and delivers low latency
and high throughput it is the ideal
storage class for a variety of use cases
that require immediate access to put
your s3 objects at all times
such as cloud applications websites
content distribution mobile and gaming
applications and big data analytics
Amazon s3 standard and frequent access
also known as s3 standard ia
is for data that is accessed less
frequently but requires immediate access
when needed such as backups of
mission-critical data and disaster
recovery environments in the event of a
system failure or a natural disaster
Amazon s3 one zone ia is like s3
standard ia and is designed for in
frequently accessed data but only stores
copies within a single availability zone
at 20% of the cost of s3 standard ia
this makes s3 1 zone ia an attractive
and cost-effective choice for secondary
backup copy
copies of on-premises data or recreate
able data that does not require the same
levels of resiliency
we also offer low-cost archiving options
for data that is rarely accessed you can
transition objects from any of the
Amazon s3 storage classes or upload data
directly into s3 glaciers AWS is data
archiving service which can restore data
in as little as one minute and bulk
restorations are completed within 12
hours you can also replace your
on-premises tape libraries and archives
your coldest least active data to s3
glacier deep archive AWS is lowest cost
storage class where you retain a
terabyte of data for around $1 a month
what about data with unknown or changing
access patterns our newest storage class
Amazon s3 intelligent tearing is the
first cloud storage class to deliver
cost savings by automatically moving
near objects between to access tiers
based on your changing access patterns
as three intelligent tearing works by
moving your objects between to access
tiers one optimize for frequent access
and another lower cost tier designed for
infrequent access
thanks for watching stay tuned to learn
more about our newest storage class
Amazon s3 intelligent tearing and how to
create lifecycle policies to realize
automatic cost savings for more
information please visit our website
[Music]
